title: How and where does one send a support ticket? Cheers

replies.body:
Ori Main, robots can't see the word "support".

Nah that was terrible I'm rly sry.
he must of been a lee sin main
Ahhhh %%%%..... Stupid question. LOL Forgive me

> How and where does one send a support ticket?

*facepalm*
Send a letter to **6041 Bristol Parkway, Culver City, CA 90230, United States**.
Or alternatively, click on the thing on your page that says support, located in the top right side of the page for those of you have to ask these questions.
